meanings.definition: A person who provides information to the police or authorities about criminal activities.
meanings.sent1: The stoolie told the police about the robbery.
meanings.sent2: The stoolie's tip led to the arrest of the thief.
meanings.sent3: The stoolie's information helped solve the case quickly.
meanings.sent4: The stoolie's role as an informant was crucial in catching the criminal.
meanings.sent5: The police relied on the stoolie's intel to catch the culprit.

meanings.sent1: The stoolie revealed the gang's plans to the authorities.
meanings.sent2: The criminal gang was exposed by a stoolie within their ranks.
meanings.sent3: The stoolie's identity was kept secret to protect them from retaliation.
meanings.sent4: The stoolie's betrayal shocked the criminal underworld.
meanings.sent5: The stoolie's actions as an informer saved many from harm.

meanings.definition: To act as an informer or snitch.
meanings.sent1: He decided to stoolie on his former partners to avoid jail time.
meanings.sent2: She stoolied on the drug dealers to clean up her neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The kids stoolied on each other to avoid getting in trouble.
meanings.sent4: Stoolieing on your friends is never a good idea.
meanings.sent5: The witness bravely stoolied on the corrupt officials.
